entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
